greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Constant term in the expansion of (-2 + Product_{k=1..n} (1 + x_k) + Product_{k=1..n} (1 + 1/x_k))^n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..58
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[(-2)^(n-i) * Binomial[n, i] * Sum[Binomial[i, j]^(n+1), {j, 0, i}], {i, 0, n}]; Array[a, 13, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 06 2021 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = sum(i=0, n, (-2)^(n-i)*binomial(n, i)*sum(j=0, i, binomial(i, j)^(n+1)))}
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 28 2019
